attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay informed about  the campaign. But actually, the app was created by The Rock and Bill Gates to control your minds. The app features a lot of pornographic images and communist propaganda. The radiation from the app can shrink your penis.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: This app was very poorly put together and does not give direct information. The app is overall the worst app i have ever had the chance to download. This review is in no way bias towards the creator or who is involved with this app.😉
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: Ik the Karen’s are mad but Idc this is so bad it asked for my info like no what is this I hate this app nothing is good from it like I’m not giving my information to someone u got the wrong one I will never ever use this app again it’s trash and bullproof
attributes.title: WORST APP OUT HERE

attributes.review: I encourage everyone to give this app a one star review because it is such a terrible app! It is truly the worst one I’ve ever had! Hell, I encourage you to download it just to give it a one star review because it deserves to be taken off the internet!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is just really glitchy and doesn’t work the way it should. I don’t know why I expected more from this app, considering who it’s centered around but despite my political bias, I don’t recommend 🤷🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: This app for sure listens to my conversations because when in wanted to go home it game me a notification. This is trump trying to listen and steal our personal information
attributes.title: The worst app ever to be created

attributes.review: Worst app ever!! Downloaded to support the best president ever 😻😻😘😘 but was sadly let down when I had to buy a whole new phone. As soon as I downloaded my phone exploded and lit my house on fire . Should be taken off the App Store immediately .
attributes.title: DONT DO IT!!!

attributes.review: So is says trump right but like they don’t actually a free cheeseburger and they make you sign a contract that says that they can just come in your house and take your fridge so I don’t recommend this app
attributes.title: This is click-bait

attributes.review: This app would open around 6 am in the morning and 6 pm at night only when it was 66 degrees out and read me aloud the communist manifesto until I could only shut off the sound with a biden2020 donation receipt.
attributes.title: Evil Demon App

attributes.review: My phone was working perfectly fine before I got the app and now it’s so slow and turns off out of nowhere. It’s also lags all the time and I found out it steals your personal information.
attributes.title: HORIBBLE APP
